info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued January 06 at 4:04AM EST until January 07 at 10:00AM EST by NWS NorthernIndiana
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 4 PM THIS AFTERNOON TO 10 AM EST FRIDAY... * WHAT...Heavy lake effect snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 5 to 9 inches expected with locally higher amounts possible. * WHERE...Berrien and Cass Counties. * WHEN...From 4 PM this afternoon to 10 AM EST Friday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. The hazardous conditions will mainly impact the Friday morning commute. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Light snow is expected to continue through the early afternoon but little to no accumulation is expected during that time. The heaviest snow will occur overnight. West winds 10 to 20 mph may cause some blowing and drifting.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency.
